overview: Recently, Xiaowen always had strange dreams at night, which led to lack of energy during the day and some abnormalities at work. When her friend Yaoyao asked very concerned, Xiaowen had to tell her honestly that Yaoyao thought Xiaowen would do this because she didn't have a boyfriend, and suggested that she join the sausage clan so that she would no longer have nightmares.
title: 前世情迷
